name: Bloodmage (Hypersonicly)
description: Bloodmage is a short game about a bloodmage, a wizard that uses their lifeforce as mana. In Bloodmage, your health and mana are the same, and you have to make critical decisions on whether to use powerful spells or save the health for later. Controls: WASD or Arrow keys to move, Left click to attack, Right click to cast a spell, Space to dash, and P to pause.
